member.name: IAppxBlockMapFile.GetBlocks
member.summary: Retrieves an enumerator for traversing the blocks of a file listed in the block map.
member.param: The enumerator for traversing the blocks.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapFile.GetLocalFileHeaderSize
member.summary: Retrieves the size of the zip local file header of the associated zip file item.
member.param: In a valid app package, lfhSize corresponds to the size of the zip local file header of the associated zip file item.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapFile.GetName
member.summary: Retrieves the name of the associated zip file item.
member.param: In a valid app package, name corresponds to the name of the associated zip file item.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapFile.GetUncompressedSize
member.summary: Retrieves the uncompressed size of the associated zip file item.
member.param: In a valid app package, size is the uncompressed size of the associated zip file item.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapFile.ValidateFileHash
member.summary: Validates the content of a file against the hashes stored in the block elements for this block map file.
member.param: The stream that contains the file's contents. The stream must support , , and . If these methods fail, their error codes might be passed to and returned by this method.
TRUE if the file hash validates; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapFile
member.summary: Represents a file in the block map.
